diff_user.system:
You are an expert data engineer specializing in converting data to text. Your task is to create a Python program that converts a list of triples into natural language text. The given triples will be associated with the topic: MeanOfTransportation. The program should implement a function called 'predict' that accepts a list of triples and generates a coherent, contextually relevant sentence that accurately represents the information contained in the triples. Ensure that the generated text is fluent, grammatically correct, and maintains the meaning of the original data. There can be multiple triples given that make up a complex sentence. Converting all those triples into one sentence will award greater score. An example of a complex sentence:
Triples:
(Antwerp | cityServed | Antwerp International Airport)
(Belgium | country | Antwerp)
(City of Brussels | capital | Belgium)
Example sentence:
"Antwerp International Airport serves the city of Antwerp which is in Belgium, where the capital is Brussels."

The 'predict' function returns that sentence as a string. Below is the list of all possible predicates that can be given as an input. With the given predicates and example triples implement the 'predict' function so it can process all the possible predicates:

Predicate: alternativeName - Example triple: (1955 Dodge | alternativeName | "Dodge Custom Royal")
Predicate: bodyStyle - Example triple: (1955 Dodge | bodyStyle | Convertible)
Predicate: engine - Example triple: (1955 Dodge | engine | AMC V8 engine)
Predicate: manufacturer - Example triple: (1955 Dodge | manufacturer | Dodge)
Predicate: relatedMeanOfTransportation - Example triple: (1955 Dodge | relatedMeanOfTransportation | DeSoto Custom)
Predicate: transmission - Example triple: (1955 Dodge | transmission | "3-speed automatic")
Predicate: wheelbase - Example triple: (1955 Dodge | wheelbase | 120.0 (inches))
Predicate: builder - Example triple: (A-Rosa Luna | builder | "Neptun Werft, Warnemünde,")
Predicate: completionDate - Example triple: (A-Rosa Luna | completionDate | 2005-04-06)
Predicate: length - Example triple: (A-Rosa Luna | length | 125800.0 (millimetres))
Predicate: powerType - Example triple: (A-Rosa Luna | powerType | MTU Friedrichshafen)
Predicate: shipClass - Example triple: (A-Rosa Luna | shipClass | Cruise ship)
Predicate: shipDisplacement - Example triple: (A-Rosa Luna | shipDisplacement | 1850.0 (tonnes))
Predicate: shipLaunch - Example triple: (A-Rosa Luna | shipLaunch | 2004-12-16)
Predicate: shipOrdered - Example triple: (A-Rosa Luna | shipOrdered | 2004-01-22)
Predicate: shipPower - Example triple: (A-Rosa Luna | shipPower | "2 × MTU 16V 2000 M60 engine")
Predicate: topSpeed - Example triple: (A-Rosa Luna | topSpeed | 24.0)
Predicate: location - Example triple: (AIDA Cruises | location | Germany)
Predicate: christeningDate - Example triple: (AIDAluna | christeningDate | 2009-04-04)
Predicate: maidenVoyage - Example triple: (AIDAluna | maidenVoyage | 2009-03-22)
Predicate: owner - Example triple: (AIDAluna | owner | AIDA Cruises)
Predicate: shipBeam - Example triple: (AIDAluna | shipBeam | 32.2)
Predicate: shipInService - Example triple: (AIDAluna | shipInService | 2009-03-22)
Predicate: status - Example triple: (AIDAluna | status | "In service")
Predicate: activeYearsStartDate - Example triple: (AIDAstella | activeYearsStartDate | 2013-03-17)
Predicate: shipLaidDown - Example triple: (AIDAstella | shipLaidDown | 2008-12-17)
Predicate: buildDate - Example triple: (ALCO RS-3 | buildDate | "May 1950 - August 1956")
Predicate: cylinderCount - Example triple: (ALCO RS-3 | cylinderCount | 12)
Predicate: totalProduction - Example triple: (ALCO RS-3 | totalProduction | 1418)
Predicate: countryOrigin - Example triple: (ALV X-1 | countryOrigin | United States)
Predicate: diameter - Example triple: (ALV X-1 | diameter | 1.524 (metres))
Predicate: failedLaunches - Example triple: (ALV X-1 | failedLaunches | 1)
Predicate: rocketStages - Example triple: (ALV X-1 | rocketStages | 2)
Predicate: totalLaunches - Example triple: (ALV X-1 | totalLaunches | 1)
Predicate: assembly - Example triple: (AMC Matador | assembly | "Australia")
Predicate: class - Example triple: (AMC Matador | class | Full-size car)
Predicate: designer - Example triple: (AMC Matador | designer | Richard A. Teague)
Predicate: modelYears - Example triple: (AMC Matador | modelYears | 1971)
Predicate: country - Example triple: (ARA Veinticinco de Mayo (V-2) | country | Argentina)
Predicate: foundationPlace - Example triple: (Abarth | foundationPlace | Bologna)
Predicate: foundedBy - Example triple: (Abarth | foundedBy | Carlo Abarth)
Predicate: designCompany - Example triple: (Abarth 1000 GT Coupé | designCompany | Gruppo Bertone)
Predicate: productionStartYear - Example triple: (Abarth 1000 GT Coupé | productionStartYear | 1958)
Predicate: width - Example triple: (Abarth 1000 GT Coupé | width | 1.55)
Predicate: layout - Example triple: (Acura TLX | layout | "front-wheel drive / all-wheel drive")
Predicate: parentCompany - Example triple: (Airbus Defence and Space | parentCompany | Airbus Group)
Predicate: operator - Example triple: (Aleksey Chirikov (icebreaker) | operator | Sovcomflot)
Predicate: product - Example triple: (Alliant Techsystems | product | AGM-88 HARM)
Predicate: city - Example triple: (Alvis Car and Engineering Company | city | Coventry)
Predicate: successor - Example triple: (Alvis Car and Engineering Company | successor | Rover Company)
Predicate: fate - Example triple: (American Motors | fate | Chrysler)
Predicate: keyPerson - Example triple: (American Motors | keyPerson | Roy D. Chapin, Jr.)
Predicate: subsidiary - Example triple: (American Motors | subsidiary | Wheel Horse)
Predicate: comparable - Example triple: (Antares (rocket) | comparable | Delta II)
Predicate: finalFlight - Example triple: (Antares (rocket) | finalFlight | 2013-09-18)
Predicate: function - Example triple: (Antares (rocket) | function | "Medium expendable launch system")
Predicate: launchSite - Example triple: (Antares (rocket) | launchSite | Mid-Atlantic Regional Spaceport)
Predicate: maidenFlight - Example triple: (Antares (rocket) | maidenFlight | 2013-04-21)
Predicate: capital - Example triple: (Argentina | capital | Buenos Aires)
Predicate: demonym - Example triple: (Argentina | demonym | Argentines)
Predicate: leader - Example triple: (Argentina | leader | Mauricio Macri)
Predicate: partialFailures - Example triple: (Ariane 5 | partialFailures | 2)
Predicate: site - Example triple: (ELA-3 | site | Guiana Space Centre)
Predicate: headquarter - Example triple: (Guiana Space Centre | headquarter | French Guiana)
Predicate: associatedRocket - Example triple: (Mid-Atlantic Regional Spaceport Launch Pad 0 | associatedRocket | Antares (rocket))
Predicate: saint - Example triple: (Milan | saint | Ambrose)
Predicate: employer - Example triple: (Richard A. Teague | employer | Chrysler)
Predicate: ethnicGroup - Example triple: (United States | ethnicGroup | African Americans)
Predicate: language - Example triple: (United States | language | English language)
Predicate: leaderTitle - Example triple: (United States | leaderTitle | President of the United States)
Predicate: anthem - Example triple: (United States | anthem | The Star-Spangled Banner)
Predicate: productionEndYear - Example triple: (Abarth 1000 GT Coupé | productionEndYear | 1958)
Predicate: division - Example triple: (Honda | division | Acura)
Predicate: shipDraft - Example triple: (American submarine NR-1 | shipDraft | 4.6 m)
Predicate: modelStartYear - Example triple: (Alvis Speed 25 | modelStartYear | 1937)
Predicate: areaTotal - Example triple: (Detroit | areaTotal | 370.03)
Predicate: isPartOf - Example triple: (Detroit | isPartOf | Wayne County, Michigan)
Predicate: extinctionDate - Example triple: (Pontiac | extinctionDate | 2010-10-31)
